title: Cloud Native Maturity Assessment
subtitle: Please answer the following questions about your practices

benefits: Your current cloud native maturity level
Strengths and improvement areas across key categories

timeTaken.quick: 15-20 minutes to complete. Covers 5 core categories.
timeTaken.standard: 25-30 minutes to complete. Covers 10 key categories.
timeTaken.comprehensive: 35-45 minutes to complete. Covers all 15 categories in depth.

categories.business_value_strategy: Business Value and Cloud Native Strategy

categoryDescriptions.foundations_culture: Assess the organization's team structure, engineering culture, and leadership approach to cloud native.
categoryDescriptions.application_architecture: Evaluate adherence to Twelve-Factor App principles, architectural patterns, and database practices.
categoryDescriptions.container_infrastructure: Evaluate container adoption, registry management, and container standards.
categoryDescriptions.cicd_practices: Evaluate continuous integration, delivery, deployment automation, and GitOps adoption.
categoryDescriptions.observability: Assess monitoring, logging, tracing, and SLO/SLI implementation capabilities.
categoryDescriptions.security_compliance: Evaluate security practices, compliance management, and network security approaches.
categoryDescriptions.data_management: Evaluate storage solutions, data services, and disaster recovery approaches.
categoryDescriptions.dora_metrics: Assess key performance indicators like deployment frequency, lead time, recovery time, and failure rate.
categoryDescriptions.infrastructure_platform: Assess infrastructure as code, platform engineering practices, and cloud strategy.
categoryDescriptions.business_value_strategy: Evaluate alignment between cloud native initiatives and business goals, ROI measurement, and strategic planning.
categoryDescriptions.operations_resilience: Assess business continuity planning, recovery strategies, disaster response, and sustainable operations.
categoryDescriptions.finops_cost_management: Evaluate cloud cost optimization, financial governance, and cost-aware engineering practices.
categoryDescriptions.app_migration_modernization: Assess strategies for migrating and modernizing legacy applications to cloud native architectures.
categoryDescriptions.multicloud_hybrid_governance: Evaluate strategies for managing multiple cloud providers and hybrid cloud environments.
categoryDescriptions.ai_ml_integration: Assess adoption of AI/ML services, integration with cloud native platforms, and MLOps practices.
categoryDescriptions.disaster_recovery: Assess business continuity planning, recovery strategies, and disaster response capabilities.
categoryDescriptions.sustainability: Evaluate energy efficiency practices, carbon footprint reduction strategies, and sustainable cloud usage.

responses.knowMorePrompt: Would you like to learn more about this topic?
responses.submitWarning: Please answer all questions before proceeding
responses.dontKnowExplanation: Select this if you're not familiar with this concept or don't have this information.

progress.title: Your Progress

knowledge.frequentDontKnow: We notice you're selecting "I don't know" frequently
knowledge.explanation: This might indicate you're not familiar with cloud native concepts, or you might not be the right person to complete this specific section of the assessment.

noQuestions.title: No questions found
noQuestions.message: There are no questions available for this category. Please try a different category or contact support.

errors.incompleteResponses: Please answer all questions before continuing.
errors.processingFailed: There was a problem processing your assessment. Redirecting to results anyway.

invalidCategory.title: Invalid Assessment Category
invalidCategory.subtitle: The requested assessment category does not exist.
invalidCategory.message: The assessment category you requested does not exist. Please go back and try again.

navigation.navigating: Navigating to the next relevant category...

instructions.allQuestionsRequired: All questions must be answered to proceed. If you don't know an answer, select "I don't know" option.
instructions.pleaseAnswerAll: Please answer all questions to enable the Next button.

overview.comparisonNote: This comparison is based on industry benchmarks.
